*/ /**
  The linearGradient() function helps you to create a linear gradient color background
 */function linearGradient(color,colorState){var angle=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:310;return"linear-gradient(".concat(angle,"deg, ").concat(color,", ").concat(colorState,")");}export default linearGradient;
